physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 =  DATE '1901-01-01' AND (%2 =  DATE '1901-01-01' OR %2 IS NULL ) THEN 0 ELSE %3 END
CASE  WHEN %1 =  DATE '1901-01-01' AND (%2 =  DATE '1901-01-01' OR %2 IS NULL ) THEN 0 ELSE %3 END
CASE  WHEN %1 = 'NO' THEN  CASE  WHEN %2 =  DATE '1901-01-01' AND (%3 =  DATE '1901-01-01' OR %3 IS NULL ) THEN 0 ELSE  ABS(%4) END  ELSE 0 END
CASE  WHEN %1 = 'NO' THEN  CASE  WHEN %2 =  DATE '1901-01-01' AND (%3 =  DATE '1901-01-01' OR %3 IS NULL ) THEN 0 ELSE  ABS(%4) END  ELSE 0 END
CASE  WHEN %1 = 'YES' THEN  CASE  WHEN %2 =  DATE '1901-01-01' AND (%3 =  DATE '1901-01-01' OR %3 IS NULL ) THEN 0 ELSE  ABS(%4) END  ELSE 0 END
CASE  WHEN %1 = 'YES' THEN  CASE  WHEN %2 =  DATE '1901-01-01' AND (%3 =  DATE '1901-01-01' OR %3 IS NULL ) THEN 0 ELSE  ABS(%4) END  ELSE 0 END
